title: Gravity Happens
description: A friends-to-lovers Christmas storyLaurenHe was there.Through all the good times, and the bad, when my world collapsed and my family passed away, he was thereHe picked me up and gave me a reason to keep going.He just never saw that the reason was him.ThomasMy best friend started pulling awayThe girl who has always been by my side was now too busy for me.Suddenly, the revolving door of my bedroom no longer held my attention, and I wasn't sure why.Would Thomas finally wake up and see what he'd been missing all this time?Find out if this crazy pair finally take a chance and allow their love story to unfold this Christmas.
author: Lizzie  James
